GSD.product_version: versions from v2.6.33 to before v5.15.61
GSD.description:
iommu/vt-d: avoid invalid memory access via node_online(NUMA_NO_NODE)

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit 0b4c0003aeda32a600f95df53b2848da8a5aa3fa, it was introduced in version v2.6.33 by commit ee34b32d8c2950f66038c8975747ef9aec855289. For more details please see the references link.
